divs: Sighting Detailsme and my daughter were outside in our garden, i was playing with my new mobile phone and my daughter pointed at something in the sky, it looked like a UFO so i quickly pointed the phones camera at the object, sadly i did not know how to zoom in. this is 100% authentic, footage only ends suddenly as the battery died.
Summary: REAL UFO, WORLDS BEST AUTHENTIC FOOTAGE
trends: There have been 154 other sightings in London
There were 2 other sightings in London on or around April 1st 2012
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
